RelatedSentence: Friedman Integrated Real Estate Solutions recently assisted a buyer in the purchase of a 26,310-square-foot industrial building at 1949 Rochester Industrial Drive in Rochester Hills , Mich .
The buyer was G & M Gutter , which outgrew its location in Auburn Hills , Mich .
G & M Gutter is a family business that specializes in roofing , siding and gutter installation , replacement and maintenance .
The seller , Meridian Real Estate Investment , LLC sold the building to Rochester Industrial Associates , LLC / G & M Gutter .
Phil Konopitski , senior vice president of brokerage services at Friedman , represented the purchaser in this transaction .
